thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 26 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: AllianceBernstein Q1 Adj. EPU $0.73

author: Reuters Editorial
title: AllianceBernstein Q1 Adj. EPU $0.73
text:
April 26 (Reuters) - AllianceBernstein Holding LP:
* ALLIANCEBERNSTEIN HOLDING L.P. ANNOUNCES FIRST QUARTER RESULTS
* QTRLY AB HOLDING DILUTED ADJUSTED EPU $0.73 * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.68 â€” THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* TOTAL ASSETS UNDER MANAGEMENT AS OF MARCH 31, 2018 WERE $549.5 BILLION, DOWN $5.0 BILLION, OR 0.9%, FROM DECEMBER 31, 2017
* TOTAL NET OUTFLOWS WERE $2.4 BILLION IN Q1, VERSUS NET INFLOWS OF $4.2 BILLION IN PREVIOUS QUARTER
* QTRLY GAAP NET REVENUES $867.8 MILLION VERSUS $764.9 MILLION
* INSTITUTIONAL CHANNEL Q1 NET OUTFLOWS OF $2.8 BILLION COMPARED TO NET INFLOWS OF $3.0 BILLION IN Q4 Source text for Eikon:
